name: Ruoyu Wang's Page
tagline: Going to graduate from USTC in 2016
body: ### Ruoyu Wang Undergraduate Students(2012-now) Department of Systems Biology School of Life Sciences University of Science & Technology of China ###Basic Information - Name: Ruoyu Wang - M/F: Male - Date of Birth: 7/12/1995 - Nationality: Chinese - Address: RM 312 BLDG 5 WEST CAMPUS USTC HEFEI ANHUI 230027 P.R.CHINA ###Academic Background - Bachelor of Science (2012 up to the present) - University of Science and Technology of China. - Transferring from School of Humanities and Social Science to School of Life Sciences in 2013 - Department: Systems Biology, Life Sciences ###Research Experience - Summer Research Internship, Innovation Centre for Cell Signaling Network, Xiamen University (Supervisor :Dr. Dawang Zhou), 2014 summer - Undergraduate Research Projects, School of Life Science ,USTC (Supervisor :Dr. Xiaoyuan Song) (2014- now) - Undergraduate Innovation Projects, USTC (Supervisor :Dr.Xiaoyuan Song)(2015- now) ###Conference - 18th Symposium of Committee for Protozoology, China Zoological Society, Yantai, Shandong, Aug 2015 ###Awards - The Third Prize Scholarship, USTC 2013-2014 - Outstanding Volunteer, STW 2014 ###Research Skills - Molecular Biology Experimental Skills - Using Bioinformatics tools and computational pipelines to perform basic NGS(Next Generation Seqeuncing) data analysis e.g. BWA, STAR, TopHat, Cufflinks and Homer - Using python,R, or perl to perform customized bioinformatics data analysis and solve biological problems ##Contact Me *** >Address：ROOM 908 East wing of Science and Technology Experiment Building School of life science West Campus USTC Hefei Anhui 230027 P.R.China Email：ahwry@mail.ustc.edu.cn Tel：+86 18075295566
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
